sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR, EVAL_METHOD_ID, GRADE_ITEM_ID, GRADE_ITEM_NM, GRADE_ITEM_RATE, GRADE_ITEM_SCORE, SORT_ORDER FROM MEM_ECM_GRADE_DISTRI_EVAL_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#findYear# AND EVAL_METHOD_ID=#findEvalMethodId# ORDER BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT YEAR , EVAL_METHOD_ID , GRADE_ITEM_ID , GRADE_ITEM_NM , GRADE_ITEM_RATE , GRADE_ITEM_SCORE , SORT_ORDER FROM MEM_ECM_GRADE_DISTRI_EVAL_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND EVAL_METHOD_ID = #evalMethodId# AND GRADE_ITEM_ID = #gradeItemId#

SELECT ITEM_CNT ,
$itemArray[]$
, CASE WHEN ITEM_CNT = ( 0 +
NVL( $itemArray[]$ , 0 )
) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS VALIDATE_SUM_YN FROM (SELECT ITEM_CNT,
MAX( CASE WHEN GRADE_ITEM_ID = '$itemArray[]$' THEN ITEM_DISTRI_CNT ELSE NULL END ) AS $itemArray[]$
FROM MEM_ECM_GRADE_DISTRI_TAB WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND EVAL_METHOD_ID = #findEvalMethodId# GROUP BY ITEM_CNT ) ORDER BY ITEM_CNT
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 'GD'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(GRADE_ITEM_ID,3,5)),0)+1,5,'0') FROM MEM_ECM_GRADE_DISTRI_EVAL_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#year#
INSERT INTO MEM_ECM_GRADE_DISTRI_EVAL_ITEM ( YEAR , EVAL_METHOD_ID , GRADE_ITEM_ID , GRADE_ITEM_NM , GRADE_ITEM_RATE , GRADE_ITEM_SCORE , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #evalMethodId# , #SEQ# , #gradeItemNm# , #gradeItemRate# , #gradeItemScore# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
